import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Route,Link,Routes}from'react-router-dom';import'./quiz.css';import'./bubbleWrap.css';import QuizDetails from'./QuizDetails';import Istoria from'./Istoria.json';import Perceptia from'./Perceptia.json';import Contrastul_in_Web_Design_si_Tehnologie from'./ContrastulWeb.json';import Contrastul_in_arta from'./ContrastulArta.json';import Durabilitatea from'./Durabilitatea.json';import Lectie_1 from'./1.json';import Lectie_2 from'./2.json';import Lectie_3 from'./3.json';import Lectie_4 from'./4.json';import Cerc from'../imagini/Cerc.png';// Import imaginea
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Quiz(){const quizzes={Istoria,Perceptia,Contrastul_in_Web_Design_si_Tehnologie,Contrastul_in_arta,Durabilitatea,Lectie_1,Lectie_2,Lectie_3,Lectie_4};const[clickedBubbles,setClickedBubbles]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const rows=15;const cols=20;const bubbleCount=rows*cols;setClickedBubbles(Array(bubbleCount).fill(false));},[]);const handleBubbleClick=index=>{const newClickedBubbles=[...clickedBubbles];newClickedBubbles[index]=!newClickedBubbles[index];setClickedBubbles(newClickedBubbles);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container w-full mx-auto p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"flex flex-wrap justify-center items-center gap-4 w-full",children:Object.keys(quizzes).map((quizName,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/quizz-uri/".concat(quizName.replace(/\s/g,'_').toLowerCase()),className:"w-1/4 flex justify-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"w-full bg-gray-600 px-5 py-3 h-16 text-2xl rounded-lg text-white hover:bg-gray-800 duration-500",children:quizName.replace(/_/g,' ')})},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Routes,{children:Object.keys(quizzes).map((quizName,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/quizz-uri/".concat(quizName.replace(/\s/g,'_').toLowerCase()),element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(QuizDetails,{quizData:quizzes[quizName]})},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bubble-wrap",children:clickedBubbles.map((clicked,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"bubble ".concat(clicked?'clicked':''),onClick:()=>handleBubbleClick(index)},index))})]});}
